text:
Make sure your search function receives a query vector, not a dictionary. To resolve this, ensure that the q passed to the search_function within evaluate is correctly transformed into an embedding vector. The following code can help:
v_query = embedding_model.encode(query_text)
results = search_function(v_query)
question: TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for *: 'float' and 'dict' when running the vector search function within the evaluate function
